e-editiones
About Semantic Web Technology Ontologies

Language

Formal description of language, general subclasses, related classes and properties.
Turtle | RDF/XML | N-Triples | JSON-LD | GitHub
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ language
a
owl:Ontology
dct:creator
Hans Cools, MD, knowledge engineer, ontologist, software developer, Basel University, Switzerland
dct:description
Formal description of language, general subclasses, related classes and properties.
dct:license
http://creativecommons.org/ licenses/ by/ 3.0/
dct:publisher
Universities of Basel, Bern, and Zürich, Switzerland
dct:title
An ontology about language
agent translator
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Role of an agent, person or machine, transferring a human natural language expression in another natural language.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ language#
rdfs:subClassOf
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ agent#Creator
language code
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Code in a coding system, attributed to a human natural language, e.g. ISO 639.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ language#
rdfs:seeAlso
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ languages#
rdfs:subClassOf
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ concept#Code
dialect
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Regional variant of a standard human natural language.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ language#
rdfs:subClassOf
human natural language
general human natural language
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Language naturally evolved in humans and used as official language in one or more countries.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ language#
rdfs:label
general human natural language
and
algemeine menschliche naturliche Sprache
rdfs:subClassOf
human natural language
human language
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Language of a human.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ language#
skos:note
Also formal language, e.g. computer programming language.
rdfs:subClassOf
language
human natural language
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Language naturally evolved in humans.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ language#
rdfs:label
human natural language
and
menschliche naturliche Sprache
skos:note
Excluded is formal language, e.g. computer programming language.
rdfs:subClassOf
human language
human natural language expression
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Expression in a human natural language.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ language#
rdfs:label
human natural language expression
and
menschliche naturliche sprachliche Äusserung
skos:note
Different from the FRBROO based document:Expression.
rdfs:subClassOf
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ concept#Information
and
http://www.cidoc-crm.org/ cidoc-crm/ E33 Linguistic Object
language
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Dynamic set of sensory carriers, e.g. a sign, symbol, word, including sound and gesture, to express meaning, and used along rules or grammar model, e.g. syntax for serialization.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ language#
rdfs:label
language
and
Sprache
rdfs:subClassOf
rdfs:Resource
and
dct:LinguisticSystem
machine translation
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Translation done by a digital electronic computer using translation software.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ language#
rdfs:subClassOf
translation
machine-translator
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Translator as role of a machine.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ language#
rdfs:subClassOf
agent translator
person's translation
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Translation done by a person.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ language#
rdfs:subClassOf
translation
and
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ creating#CreationDerivative
person-translator
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Translator as role of a person.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ language#
rdfs:label
person-translator
and
Person-Übersetzer
rdfs:subClassOf
agent translator
and
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ creating#PersonCreator
translation
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Human natural language expression transferred from another natural language.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ language#
rdfs:label
translation
,
traduzione
,
Übersetzung
and
traduction
skos:note
Can follow the original to a degree, hence differ from another translation; e.g. a free translation gives a general meaning.
rdfs:seeAlso
https://www.abc-clio.com/ ODLIS/ odlis t.aspx
rdfs:subClassOf
human natural language expression
expressed in dialect
a
owl:ObjectProperty
rdfs:comment
Relating a human expression to a dialect it is expressed in.
rdfs:domain
human natural language expression
rdfs:isDefinedBy
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ language#
rdfs:range
dialect
language has code
a
owl:InverseFunctionalProperty
rdfs:comment
Relating a language to a system code representing that language.
rdfs:domain
human natural language
rdfs:isDefinedBy
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ language#
rdfs:range
language code
rdfs:subPropertyOf
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ concept#hasCode
has content literal
a
owl:DatatypeProperty
rdfs:comment
Relating a human natural language expression to its content.
rdfs:domain
human natural language expression
rdfs:isDefinedBy
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ language#
rdfs:range
rdfs:Literal
rdfs:subPropertyOf
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ concept#symbolicEntityHasLiteral
